item.title: Album of the week
item.description: This album was really good but here are some others
item.content: This album was really good but here are some others

item.title: Personal pick #1
item.description: It would be a good place to start with one of my favourite albums of all time. Ghosts is a fascinating adventure into the thoughts and feelings of Trent Reznor in the most abstract and interesting way. Starting with Ghosts 1.
item.content:
It would be a good place to start with one of my favourite albums of all time. Ghosts is a fascinating adventure into the thoughts and feelings of Trent Reznor in the most abstract and interesting way.

Starting with Ghosts 1.
